data.quote: It's not the teaching, it's the learning.

data.quote: I just want to do shows because you get to see, over all the seasons, the person grow, and you get to grow with the character. That transformation, for me, is what I love about my job. data.quote: As long as I'm learning every day of my life, I will never feel old. Never. And I don't feel old; I feel in my head and in my heart - I don't know, ageless!

data.quote: The best way of learning to be an independent sovereign state is to be an independent sovereign state.

data.quote: I grew up watching and learning from the ultimate partnership, and that is of my father and late uncle.

data.quote: Wine is bottled poetry.

data.quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.

data.quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.

data.quote: I still eat a burger at a counter with ketchup dripping down my face.

When you begin to do that then literature is really performing its wonders.

data.quote: A lot of restaurants serve good food, but they don't have very good service.

data.quote: I love photography, I love food, and I love traveling, and to put those three things together would just be the ultimate dream.

data.quote: I really see food as subjective. It's a creative outlet. It's something that you do for fun. It's a gray area. It's not black and white or right and wrong.

data.quote: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy.

data.quote: Italy has great food and Barcelona has great energy.
data.author: Stefon Harris

data.quote: Do but stand still in the hour of trial, and you will see the help of God, if you trust in Him. But there is so often a forsaking the ways of the Lord in the hour of trial, and thus the food of faith, the means whereby our faith may be increased, is lost.
data.author: George Muller

data.quote: I love sitcoms, and I grew up on sitcoms. That's my tasty junk food.
data.author: Felicia Day

data.quote: I love food: biscuits and gravy, cheese grits, spaghetti and meatballs, chicken-fried steak with white gravy... but my favorite dish is my wife's beanie weenie cornbread casserole. It's so good. It sounds stupid, but if you eat it, it's heaven. Of course, it's only something you can eat if you've got a lot of money.
data.author: Larry the Cable Guy

data.quote: All food is comfort food. Maybe I just like to chew.
data.author: Lewis Black

data.quote: Food makes travel so exceptional, because you get to taste what it's actually supposed to taste like. To eat the real Pad Thai or finally have a proper curry is something pretty amazing.
data.author: Meghan Markle

data.quote: My food demons are Chinese food, sugar, butter.
data.author: Kirstie Alley

data.quote: In World War II, jazz absolutely was the music of freedom, and then in the Cold War, behind the Iron Curtain, same thing. It was all underground, but they needed the food of freedom that jazz offered.
data.author: Herbie Hancock

data.quote: We have a list of human rights - right to food, right to shelter, right to health, right to education, many such items which are considered and accepted as bill of rights. These are to be insured to people. So all nations, all societies try to do that.
data.author: Muhammad Yunus

data.quote: We have soon to have everywhere smoke annihilators, dust absorbers, ozonizers, sterilizers of water, air, food and clothing, and accident preventers on streets, elevated roads and in subways. It will become next to impossible to contract disease germs or get hurt in the city, and country folk will got to town to rest and get well.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.quote: I learned to cook in self-defense. My wife doesn't know what a kitchen is. In the first month of our marriage, she broiled lamb chops 26 nights in a row. Then I took over. I used to mind her not caring about food, but no more - as long as I can eat what I want.
data.author: Alan King

data.quote: People come up to me all the time and ask how I stay the way I am, and it's no secret. The first lesson a chef needs to learn is how to handle a knife; the second is how to be around all that food.
data.author: Marcus Samuelsson

data.quote: Food that's served at the table in a paper parcel always creates a remarkable culinary moment when opened, because the package is full of aromatic steam from the lightly cooked ingredients inside.
data.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

data.quote: I love trying out different cuisines. In Delhi, I love Megu at the Leela, and TK's at the Hyatt. I also enjoy Khan Chacha's rolls. In Mumbai, it's Royal China and Shiro. And in Bangalore, I like the food at Bricklane.
data.author: Virat Kohli

data.quote: I'm Italian. I love to cook Italian food, so I learned from my dad how to make sauce and meatballs and all that stuff. With my wife and kids, I started making homemade pasta. The very first time, I didn't have a pasta maker, so I had to cut it with a knife, the old-school way! The noodles were all jacked up, but it was fun.
data.author: Joey Fatone

data.quote: Milan, for me, is a city of discovery. You can find some amazing gardens behind some great houses; I also love finding beautiful galleries and incredible shops, but you have to explore. And the food is amazing.
data.author: Francisco Costa

data.quote: I was mischievous. I wasn't bad. I stole food so we could eat. My mother didn't know. I used to tell her some man gave me $10 to sweep out the yard. I was like Robin Hood. I took from the rich and gave to the poor. Me.
data.author: Mr. T

data.quote: Food culture is like listening to the Beatles - it's international, it's very positive, it's inventive and creative.
data.author: Alice Waters

data.quote: Libraries are the ultimate restaurants for brain food. I sleep better knowing there are libraries. I would take a bullet for a librarian.
data.author: Simon Van Booy

data.quote: I am writing to all the churches to let it be known that I will gladly die for God if only you do not stand in my way... Let me be food for the wild beasts, for they are my way to God.
data.author: Ignatius of Antioch

data.quote: I'd love to give my girls a traditional Thanksgiving with turkey and all that jazz, but we've raised them to love Tuscan food so much that they don't care for it. My favorite is a nice polenta with beef stew and broccoli rabe on the side.
data.author: Debi Mazar

data.quote: Every decision we make - when we choose a vehicle, when we pump gas into that vehicle, when we order food - is not just a personal lifestyle choice. It's an environmental and moral choice.
data.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

data.quote: Food feeds both the body and soul - there are clear reasons to eat a balanced diet, but there are also reasons you cling to your mom's secret chicken noodle soup recipe when you're sick.
data.author: Michael Mina

data.quote: Roast beef, medium, is not only a food. It is a philosophy.
data.author: Edna Ferber

data.quote: When I eat cilantro, it's like someone sprayed perfume down my throat. It closes up my throat, even if there's only a little piece. I like Mexican food, and I'll go out to a Mexican restaurant and tell them, 'Look, I will die if you get cilantro in my food.' Then there's always that one little piece that falls in, and I gag.
data.author: Amber Rose

data.quote: Global warming will threaten our crops, so natural food will be scarce. Hourglass, curvy bodies will be the aspirational beauty standard, representing that those women have access to bounties of fulfilling yet healthy food, which means they are affluent.
data.author: Tyra Banks

data.quote: I'm very conscious about putting good food into my body. Years ago, I went to see an amazing healer called Allah, who could read your body. She told me that I can't absorb vitamins very well, and I have to eat the right things to get my vitamins. I've always remembered that.
data.author: Trinny Woodall

data.quote: When I'm out, maybe I'm looking at the fried chicken, but I know I need to order the grilled. But I'm still from the country. I love my fried food and my neck bones and all that, too.
data.author: Adrian Peterson

data.quote: Seafood was always my favorite food. I mean, fried lobster? Come on. Once I found out shrimp, scallops and lobster were my allergic triggers, I had to change my diet.
data.author: Adrian Peterson

data.quote: All those spices and herbs in your spice rack can do more than provide calorie-free, natural flavorings to enhance and make food delicious. They're also an incredible source of antioxidants and help rev up your metabolism and improve your health at the same time.
data.author: Suzanne Somers

data.quote: I like being able to go to a local pub and have great food and particularly love pubs that welcome my dogs.
data.author: Kevin Spacey

data.quote: From Japan to Thailand, I keep discovering amazing talent, cuisine and food markets.
data.author: Daniel Boulud

data.quote: When I get out of work early, or if I have some time before I go into the studio, I go to Disneyland for a few hours with my siblings. We just have fun, go on all the rides together, and eat all of the good food.
data.author: Becky G

data.quote: I like simple food, seasoned with just salt, pepper, oil and vinegar. Complicated food and complicated lives are never good.
data.author: Sirio Maccioni

data.quote: Yes, people need food and education. But one of the cornerstones of any society is a well-functioning legal system.
data.author: Cherie Blair

data.quote: For me, I love food. It's my greatest pleasure and also the thing that could ruin you as well. It's one of those things where, if you're not thoughtful about it, it could be unhealthy. But if there's a mindfulness about it; it actually is a wonderful tool of emotional expression.
data.author: Jon Favreau

data.quote: I'd rather have a good food - lots and lots of different varieties of good foods - than search for something perfect.
data.author: Bee Wilson

data.quote: Ounce for ounce, herbs and spices have more antioxidants than any other food group.
data.author: Michael Greger

data.quote: It is as necessary for man to live in beauty rather than ugliness as it is necessary for him to have food for an aching belly or rest for a weary body.
data.author: Abraham Maslow

data.quote: When the woodpecker is searching for food, or laying siege to some hidden grub, the sound of his hammer is dead or muffled and is heard but a few yards. It is only upon dry, seasoned timber, freed of its bark, that he beats his reveille to spring and wooes his mate.
data.author: John Burroughs

data.quote: People need to look at wildlife conservation in its totality. As soon as you lose the apex predator, it has harmful consequences right down the food chain.
data.author: Thomas Kaplan

data.quote: It's important to have a healthy balanced diet but not to get too bogged down about it. It's important to enjoy your food, too.
data.author: Katie Taylor

data.quote: An adult human can last 40 days without food, a week without any sleep, three days without water, but only five minutes without air. Yet nothing is more taken for granted than the air we breathe. However, not just any air will do - it must be exquisitely designed to meet our needs. Too little oxygen in the atmosphere will kill us, as will too much.
data.author: Hugh Ross
